ud4.8:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud4.8:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava sakkato hoti garukato manito pujito apacito labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud4.8:1.4: Bhikkhusanghopi sakkato hoti garukato manito pujito apacito labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud4.8:1.5: Annatitthiya pana paribbajaka asakkata honti agarukata amanita apujita anapacita na labhino civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud4.8:2.1: Atha kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka bhagavato sakkaram asahamana bhikkhusanghassa ca yena sundari paribbajika tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva sundarim paribbajikam etadavocum:
ud4.8:3.2: “Evam, ayya”ti kho sundari paribbajika tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam patissutva abhikkhanam jetavanam agamasi.
ud4.8:4.2: “vodittha kho sundari paribbajika bahujanena abhikkhanam jetavanam gacchanti”ti.
ud4.8:4.3: Atha nam jivita voropetva tattheva jetavanassa parikhakupe nikkhipitva yena raja pasenadi kosalo tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva rajanam pasenadim kosalam etadavocum:
ud4.8:4.4: “ya sa, maharaja, sundari paribbajika; sa no na dissati”ti.
ud4.8:5.1: Atha kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka jetavanam vicinitva yathanikkhittam parikhakupa uddharitva mancakam aropetva savatthim pavesetva rathiyaya rathiyam singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva manusse ujjhapesum:
ud4.8:6.2: Alajjino ime samana sakyaputtiya dussila papadhamma musavadino abrahmacarino.
ud4.8:6.3: Ime hi nama dhammacarino samacarino brahmacarino saccavadino silavanto kalyanadhamma patijanissanti.
ud4.8:6.4: Natthi imesam samannam, natthi imesam brahmannam.
ud4.8:6.5: Nattham imesam samannam, nattham imesam brahmannam.
ud4.8:6.6: Kuto imesam samannam, kuto imesam brahmannam?
ud4.8:6.7: Apagata ime samanna, apagata ime brahmanna.
ud4.8:6.8: Kathanhi nama puriso purisakiccam karitva itthim jivita voropessati”ti.
ud4.8:7.1: Tena kho pana samayena savatthiyam manussa bhikkhu disva asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosanti paribhasanti rosanti vihesanti:
ud4.8:8.1: “Alajjino ime samana sakyaputtiya dussila papadhamma musavadino abrahmacarino.
ud4.8:8.2: Ime hi nama dhammacarino samacarino brahmacarino saccavadino silavanto kalyanadhamma patijanissanti.
ud4.8:8.3: Natthi imesam samannam, natthi imesam brahmannam.
ud4.8:8.4: Nattham imesam samannam, nattham imesam brahmannam.
ud4.8:8.5: Kuto imesam samannam, kuto imesam brahmannam?
ud4.8:8.6: Apagata ime samanna, apagata ime brahmanna.
ud4.8:8.7: Kathanhi nama puriso purisakiccam karitva itthim jivita voropessati”ti.
ud4.8:9.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisimsu.
ud4.8:9.2: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud4.8:10.1: “Etarahi, bhante, savatthiyam manussa bhikkhu disva asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosanti paribhasanti rosanti vihesanti:
ud4.8:10.2: ‘alajjino ime samana sakyaputtiya dussila papadhamma musavadino abrahmacarino.
ud4.8:10.3: Ime hi nama dhammacarino samacarino brahmacarino saccavadino silavanto kalyanadhamma patijanissanti.
ud4.8:10.4: Natthi imesam samannam, natthi imesam brahmannam.
ud4.8:10.5: Nattham imesam samannam, nattham imesam brahmannam.
ud4.8:10.6: Kuto imesam samannam, kuto imesam brahmannam?
ud4.8:10.7: Apagata ime samanna, apagata ime brahmanna.
ud4.8:10.8: Kathanhi nama puriso purisakiccam karitva itthim jivita voropessati’”ti.
ud4.8:11.1: “Neso, bhikkhave, saddo ciram bhavissati sattahameva bhavissati. Sattahassa accayena antaradhayissati.
ud4.8:11.2: Tena hi, bhikkhave, ye manussa bhikkhu disva asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosanti paribhasanti rosanti vihesanti, te tumhe imaya gathaya paticodetha:
ud4.8:12.2: Yo vapi katva na karomi caha;
ud4.8:13.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu bhagavato santike imam gatham pariyapunitva ye manussa bhikkhu disva asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosanti paribhasanti rosanti vihesanti te imaya gathaya paticodenti:
ud4.8:14.2: Yo vapi katva na karomi caha;
ud4.8:15.2: “akaraka ime samana sakyaputtiya, nayimehi katam, sapantime samana sakyaputtiya”ti.
ud4.8:15.3: Neva so saddo ciram ahosi. Sattahameva ahosi. Sattahassa accayena antaradhayi.
ud4.8:16.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavato etadavocum:
ud4.8:17.3: ‘neso, bhikkhave, saddo ciram bhavissati. Sattahameva bhavissati. Sattahassa accayena antaradhayissati’ti.
ud4.8:18.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
